page.title: 05Family 1 Shobdon and Byton
page.content:
In our survey we found that{50 {people had children living with them.
1 home with 1 adult and 2 children 1 home with 1 adult and 3 children 13 homes with 2 adults and 1 child 17 homes with 2 adults and 2 children 10 homes with 2 adults and 3 children 2 homes with 2 adults and 4 children 1 home with 2 adults and 5 children 1 home with 3 adults and 1 child 2 homes with 3 adults and 2 children 1 home with 4 adults and 1 child 1 home with 5 adults and 1 child
In the{28 homes,without children}in them,we found that there were;
4 homes with 1 adult 18 homes with 2 adults 4 homes with 3 adults 2 homes with 4 adults
